works.description:
Dissertation and now monograph.

Hello: as there is no place to offer an explanation, I make it here.  
According to a contract signed by me and the University of Fribourg, they 

placed my dissertation on the web and then removed it once CUA Press
agreed  
to print it as a monograph. Fribourg assures me that they have taken down 

the link and that Google is publishing the PDF of my dissertation, even  
though the link specifies "unifr." Is that right? And will you take this  
link down for me? Thanks.

Once the book is out, I hope you will scan it as you do other books!
